alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 7
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 7 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements and features.

Here’s what’s new:

  • Column Width Settings now shows live preview
  • Improved the UI for Accounts panel
  • Other UI improvements and bug fixes

Any suggestion or any bug? Please report them to us in the Slack Team #bug/#feedback channel

Oh, and welcome aboard!
